translated: The Sūtra of the Dhāraṇī of Mūlāparājita
The name of the translator is lost, now attached to the Liang Catalog

original: 若欲受持牟梨曼陀羅。必須成驗者。先護三
analyzed: 若欲受持牟梨曼陀羅。必須成驗者。先護三
translated: If you wish to uphold the Mūlāparājita Dhāraṇī, you must first protect the three
karmas and make them extremely pure.

original: 復先定一所有舍利之塔者。
analyzed: 復先定一所有舍利之塔者。
translated: Moreover, you should first select a stūpa that contains relics.
Then, you should choose an auspicious time and date.

original: 所謂從白月一日至十五日為好時日也。
analyzed: 所謂從白月一日至十五日為好時日也。
translated: That is to say, from the first day of the bright fortnight up to the fifteenth day are auspicious days and dates.
If you use a single day to practice, that is also acceptable.

original: 即當用其月十五日最為第一。
analyzed: 即當用其月十五日最為第一。
translated: Then, you should use the fifteenth day of the month, which is the best.
Wash with fragrant hot water, put on new clean clothes.

original: 隨其力分供養諸佛一切菩薩及金剛等。
analyzed: 隨其力分供養諸佛一切菩薩及金剛等。
translated: Make offerings to all Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, and Vajrapāṇis according to your ability.

original: 然燈四盞取其時花以為供養。
analyzed: 然燈四盞取其時花以為供養。
translated: Light four lamps and take seasonal flowers as offerings.
You should eat three kinds of white food.
Circumambulate the stūpa and maṇḍala every day.
Recite it once for each circuit.
In this way, complete one hundred and eight recitations.
If sleep comes, just sleep in front of the stupa.

original: 欲明相時佛及金剛便現夢中。
analyzed: 欲明相時佛及金剛便現夢中。
translated: When wanting to see the morning star, the Buddha and Vajra will appear in dreams.

original: 得此感已隨所有願無不滿足。
analyzed: 得此感已隨所有願無不滿足。
translated: Having received this inspiration, all wishes will be fulfilled.

original: 又誦此陀羅尼滿三萬遍。
analyzed: 又誦此陀羅尼滿三萬遍。
translated: Moreover, recite this dharani 30,000 times.
The heavy sins of the five heinous crimes will be immediately eradicated.

original: 若持此陀羅尼求至驗者。
analyzed: 若持此陀羅尼求至驗者。
translated: If one upholds this dharani seeking for verification,
one should not harbor any greedy thoughts.
One should be free from desire and attachment, with a single-minded focus.
Reciting and upholding in this way will surely bring swift verification.
If one can recite it 108 times every day,
all endeavors will be profitable.
All poisons will be unable to harm.
Even if others use poison to harm, it will not be able to harm.
Water cannot drown, fire cannot burn.
Diseases and epidemics cannot contaminate.

original: 假使國內所有賊難災禍亦不為害。
analyzed: 假使國內所有賊難災禍亦不為害。
translated: Even if there are thieves, disasters, and calamities in the country, they will not cause harm.
It can make the eyes, ears, nose, and so on,

original: 及於口齒身諸少分亦無苦痛。
analyzed: 及於口齒身諸少分亦無苦痛。
translated: And there will be no pain in the mouth, teeth, or any part of the body.

original: 乃至不為一日二三日諸熱病等之所為害。
analyzed: 乃至不為一日二三日諸熱病等之所為害。
translated: One will not be harmed by fever for one, two, or three days.

original: 一切蛇獸毒惡無更傷及諸厭蠱無終能害者。
analyzed: 一切蛇獸毒惡無更傷及諸厭蠱無終能害者。
translated: All snake and animal poisons and evil spells will not be able to harm one in the end.

original: 以要言之一切諸惡無所能為。
analyzed: 以要言之一切諸惡無所能為。
translated: In short, all evils will be unable to do anything.

original: 當知此曼陀羅有如是等大威神力。
analyzed: 當知此曼陀羅有如是等大威神力。
translated: One should know that this maṇḍala has such great majestic spiritual power.
It can remove all fearful things.
It can destroy all fundamental sins.
It can abide in all meritorious abodes.
It can fulfill all perfections.

original: 乃至能令疾至無上正等菩提。
analyzed: 乃至能令疾至無上正等菩提。
translated: It can even enable one to quickly attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 若於高山頂上而誦之者。
analyzed: 若於高山頂上而誦之者。
translated: If one recites it on a high mountain peak,

original: 所有一切山谷水陸諸眾生等。
analyzed: 所有一切山谷水陸諸眾生等。
translated: all the sentient beings in the mountains, valleys, water, and on land,
will see the realm with their eyes and see the mantra master.
All their clans will exhaust their karmic lives.
They will never again fall into the three evil paths.
If one recites this mantra inside a temple dedicated to the gods,
all the gods of the Zoroastrian faith will come and pay homage.

original: 若於有龍池中誦其呪者。
analyzed: 若於有龍池中誦其呪者。
translated: If one recites this mantra by a dragon pond,
all the nagas will come and pay homage.
If one recites this mantra in front of the sun,
Suryaraja will come down and pay homage.

original: 若於金剛像前誦是呪者。
analyzed: 若於金剛像前誦是呪者。
translated: If one recites this mantra in front of a Vajra image,
Vajra will manifest in person and fulfill one's wishes.

original: 若呪昌蒲滿八千遍而自服之。
analyzed: 若呪昌蒲滿八千遍而自服之。
translated: If one recites this mantra 8,000 times over changpu and then consumes it,
one will be able to see the king.
Whatever one says will be followed without disobedience.

original: 若呪胡椒滿八千遍而口含之。
analyzed: 若呪胡椒滿八千遍而口含之。
translated: If one recites this mantra 8,000 times over black pepper and then chews it,
it will cause those who see it to be delighted.
Whatever instructions one gives will not be dared to be disobeyed.

original: 若呪白芥子滿八千遍散向空中。
analyzed: 若呪白芥子滿八千遍散向空中。
translated: If one recites this mantra 8,000 times over white mustard seeds and scatters them into the air,
it will be able to stop bad winds and bad rains,
untimely frost, hail, and all calamities.
All of them will be eliminated.

original: 若呪食鹽八百遍已食婆囉覓者。
analyzed: 若呪食鹽八百遍已食婆囉覓者。
translated: If one recites the mantra over salt eight hundred times and then eats it,
it will enable those with evil minds among non-Buddhists
to have their evil minds naturally cease and come to submit.

original: 若呪白芥子稱曷囉闍名。
analyzed: 若呪白芥子稱曷囉闍名。
translated: If one recites the mantra over white mustard seeds while calling the name of a king,
reciting the mantra once and burning it once, a total of eight hundred times,

original: 能令曷囉闍屈曲隨從無復違逆。
analyzed: 能令曷囉闍屈曲隨從無復違逆。
translated: it will enable the king to be submissive and obedient without any further defiance.
If one recites the mantra over frankincense eight thousand times,
and burns it to fumigate a person afflicted with a ghost illness,
the ghost will immediately reveal its name and surname.
The mantra master can then rebuke and expel the ghost without any disobedience.
If one wishes to pray for rain,
one should take blue cow dung and make a dragon,

original: 一身三頭朱染脊背金裝胸臆。
analyzed: 一身三頭朱染脊背金裝胸臆。
translated: with one body and three heads, its back and spine dyed red and its chest and flanks adorned with gold.
First, make a square altar.
Whether on a high platform or flat ground, do it according to the circumstances.
Also, apply blue-green paint to the altar.
Place the dragon on the altar.

original: 其壇四角各一水瓶各一香鑪。
analyzed: 其壇四角各一水瓶各一香鑪。
translated: In the four corners of the altar, place a water bottle and an incense burner each.

original: 一燒薰陸香一燒栴檀香。
analyzed: 一燒薰陸香一燒栴檀香。
translated: Burn olibanum incense and sandalwood incense.

original: 一燒酥合香一燒安悉香。
analyzed: 一燒酥合香一燒安悉香。
translated: One should burn ghee and incense, and one should burn asafetida incense.
Moreover, outside the altar, one should make another altar.
Four cubits long and wide, smeared with cow dung on top.
Place a vase in each of the four corners.

original: 一盛水和乳一盛水和酪。
analyzed: 一盛水和乳一盛水和酪。
translated: One filled with water mixed with milk, one filled with water mixed with curd,
one filled with water mixed with rice gruel,
and one filled with water mixed with fat.
Moreover, inside the altar, light eight lamps.

original: 又以脚極實𠼝此云紅藍花未的及󰉓莊嚴其壇。
analyzed: 又以脚極實𠼝此云紅藍花未的及󰉓莊嚴其壇。
translated: Moreover, use red safflower and unhusked rice to adorn the altar.
Moreover, insert an arrow in each of the four corners.
Moreover, tie the arrows with five-colored thread.

original: 又作五色旛子懸其箭頭。
analyzed: 又作五色旛子懸其箭頭。
translated: Moreover, make five-colored flags and hang them on the arrowheads.

original: 又將七種穀散其壇內又用五彩莊飾供設壇上。
analyzed: 又將七種穀散其壇內又用五彩莊飾供設壇上。
translated: Moreover, scatter the seven kinds of grains inside the altar. Moreover, use the five colors to decorate and set up offerings on the altar.

original: 又以當時所有種種花果盡設壇內。
analyzed: 又以當時所有種種花果盡設壇內。
translated: Moreover, use all kinds of flowers and fruits available at that time and set them up inside the altar.
Then, the mantra master faces east.
Recite the mantra to obtain 8,000 white mustard seeds.
Recite once and strike the dragon's head with each mustard seed.
Having struck like this for eight thousand times,
The great clouds gather in the four directions and immediately pour down sweet rain.

original: 從此已後一切那伽咸並敬奉。
analyzed: 從此已後一切那伽咸並敬奉。
translated: From this point on, all nāgas will respectfully serve.

original: 若雨過多呪白芥子滿八百遍。
analyzed: 若雨過多呪白芥子滿八百遍。
translated: If the rain is too much, chant the mantra over white mustard seeds eight hundred times,

original: 投於有龍水中其雨即止。
analyzed: 投於有龍水中其雨即止。
translated: And throw them into the water where there are dragons, and the rain will stop.
When chanting this mantra, one must not speak at all.
If it is time to pray for rain, but there are violent clouds, storms,

original: 苦霧卒雹乍聚乍散障其雨者。
analyzed: 苦霧卒雹乍聚乍散障其雨者。
translated: Painful fog, sudden hail, gathering and dispersing, obstructing the rain,

original: 作佉陀羅木橛打於龍淵岸側。
analyzed: 作佉陀羅木橛打於龍淵岸側。
translated: Make a stake of khadira wood and strike the shore of the dragon pond.
Then all obstacles and difficulties will all be scattered.
If when praying for rain, one is obstructed by all kinds of difficulties,
Causing the rain to not fall,

original: 當於壇內畫一毘那藥劍。
analyzed: 當於壇內畫一毘那藥劍。
translated: One should draw a Vināyaka sword inside the altar.
Take eight hundred white mustard seeds,

original: 粒呪一遍用打毘那藥劍。
analyzed: 粒呪一遍用打毘那藥劍。
translated: And chant the mantra over each seed to strike the Vināyaka sword.
In this way, complete eight hundred times,
Causing all those who create obstacles and difficulties,

original: 悉自被縛不復能障其雨即下。
analyzed: 悉自被縛不復能障其雨即下。
translated: They all bound themselves and were no longer able to obstruct the rain, which then fell.

original: 事既了已當用乳汁洗去畫像。
analyzed: 事既了已當用乳汁洗去畫像。
translated: After the matter was finished, use milk to wash away the painted image.
The Vināyakas were overjoyed.

original: 從是已後一切所求無不如意。
analyzed: 從是已後一切所求無不如意。
translated: From then on, all that was sought was not contrary to one's wishes.
The one who upholds the mantra, their body and clothing,
all must always be strict and clean.

original: 其根本曼陀羅功德略說如是。
analyzed: 其根本曼陀羅功德略說如是。
translated: The merits of the fundamental maṇḍala are briefly explained like this.
Then, the mantra is spoken:

original: 那麼薩囉婆二合怛他竭多去喃烏唵二合毘布羅揭陛摩尼波𡀔陛怛他多去達囉二合設儞平摩尼平摩尼平素鉢囉陛毘末梨娑竭囉鉗苾𠼝虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合什伐二合囉什伐二合囉勃陀毘路吉帝炬醯血桂反耶地瑟恥多竭陛莎引訶上是根本陀羅尼法。
analyzed: 那麼薩囉婆二合怛他竭多去喃烏唵二合毘布羅揭陛摩尼波𡀔陛怛他多去達囉二合設儞平摩尼平摩尼平素鉢囉陛毘末梨娑竭囉鉗苾𠼝虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合什伐二合囉什伐二合囉勃陀毘路吉帝炬醯血桂反耶地瑟恥多竭陛莎引訶上是根本陀羅尼法。
translated: Namaḥ sarva tathāgatānāṃ om viprābhaṃ jayamāṇi pāyai tathāgatadharmasvabhāva māṇi māṇi svabhāva viśuddha viśuddha viśuddha viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva viśva

original: 復次當說牟梨大曼陀囉功德。
analyzed: 復次當說牟梨大曼陀囉功德。
translated: Next, I will explain the merits of the great maṇḍala of Mūlā.

original: 若有誦滿十萬遍者得見一切諸佛。
analyzed: 若有誦滿十萬遍者得見一切諸佛。
translated: If one recites it ten thousand times, one will be able to see all buddhas.
If one recites it twenty thousand times,
one will be able to see the stages of practice of all bodhisattvas.
If one recites it thirty thousand times,
it is as if one has entered all maṇḍalas.

original: 持一切呪無不通驗誦滿四十萬遍者。
analyzed: 持一切呪無不通驗誦滿四十萬遍者。
translated: If one recites it forty thousand times,
one will attain accomplishment in all mantra practices and become the king of mantra holders.
If one recites it fifty thousand times,
one will be able to see the palaces of all asuras.
If one recites it sixty thousand times,
one will be able to see all underground treasures.
If one recites it seventy thousand times,

original: 得見現在未來一切事本。
analyzed: 得見現在未來一切事本。
translated: one will be able to see all present and future events.
If one recites it eighty thousand times,
this person will attain the samādhi of the ocean of treasures.
If one recites it ninety thousand times,

original: 得一切諸佛真行正業履妙覺地。
analyzed: 得一切諸佛真行正業履妙覺地。
translated: one will attain the true practice, correct activity, and wondrous enlightenment ground of all buddhas.
Recite it one hundred thousand times,
and you will receive the prediction of enlightenment from all buddhas.
If a person has committed the five heinous crimes or the uninterrupted [evil deeds],
and is able to recite this mantra ten thousand times,
their grave offenses as above will all be eradicated,
and they will attain the stage of nonretrogression.

original: 又得知於一切他心善惡。
analyzed: 又得知於一切他心善惡。
translated: Moreover, they will be able to know the good and evil thoughts of others,

original: 復得眼根清淨耳根清淨鼻根清淨舌根清淨身根清淨。
analyzed: 復得眼根清淨耳根清淨鼻根清淨舌根清淨身根清淨。
translated: and they will attain the pure eye faculty, the pure ear faculty, the pure nose faculty, the pure tongue faculty, and the pure body faculty.
The five pure faculties will adorn them with their own merits.
If one recites it ten thousand times,
one will obtain the merits as explained above,

original: 滅於如上無盡重罪。🔽至百萬遍者。
analyzed: 滅於如上無盡重罪。 至百萬遍者。
translated: and eradicate the endless grave offenses as above.🔽Up to one hundred thousand recitations,
each twenty thousand recitations,
will separately attain immeasurable and boundless merits.
Each merit will be twice as excellent as the previous one.

original: 復次先當洗浴著新淨衣。
analyzed: 復次先當洗浴著新淨衣。
translated: Next, one should first take a bath and put on new clean clothes.

original: 取其斛他梵語蘇乾得石留黃未詳定於銅器中和水研之。
analyzed: 取其斛他梵語蘇乾得石留黃未詳定於銅器中和水研之。
translated: Take the Sukha (Sanskrit) and Sūkha (Sanskrit) and grind them with water in a copper vessel.
Place it in front of the Buddha and offer the three white foods.
From the eighth day to the fifteenth day,
recite and uphold this mantra for a full 100,000 times.
If the Sukha is obtained, three signs will appear.
If there is a sign of heat, take it and apply it to the forehead.
Wherever one goes, one will arrive as one wishes.
And be the king of all in the mantra.

original: 又更誦呪候於額上。🔽烟相現時即於額上。
analyzed: 又更誦呪候於額上。 烟相現時即於額上。
translated: Moreover, recite the mantra and wait for the forehead.
When the sign of smoke appears, take the Sukha from the forehead and apply it to the eyes.

original: 應時即見十方一切諸佛菩薩金剛所在住處。
analyzed: 應時即見十方一切諸佛菩薩金剛所在住處。
translated: At that moment, one will see the abodes of all Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, and Vajrapāṇis in the ten directions.

original: 一切諸魔而於此人無敢惡視。
analyzed: 一切諸魔而於此人無敢惡視。
translated: All demons will not dare to look at this person with malice.
All essential teachings will be fully accomplished.
All merits will be accomplished without fail.
Moreover, if the sign of fire appears on the forehead,

original: 則得什伐囉泥去南三昧。
analyzed: 則得什伐囉泥去南三昧。
translated: One will attain the samādhi of Śubha-pradhāna.
And among the thirty-three heavens,
One will attain great honor and victory, and all kinds of mastery.

original: 復次若於山頂誦一萬遍。
analyzed: 復次若於山頂誦一萬遍。
translated: Next, if one recites it ten thousand times on a mountain peak,

original: 即於贍部諸域一切族中。
analyzed: 即於贍部諸域一切族中。
translated: Then in all the clans of Jambudvīpa,
One will attain great honor and victory, and become a king.

original: 若入有龍水內誦八千遍。
analyzed: 若入有龍水內誦八千遍。
translated: If one enters water inhabited by nāgas and recites it eight thousand times,
All nāgas will not fail to respect and honor it.
If one enchants white mustard seeds eight thousand times
And scatters them in the air, one will be able to make it rain.

original: 一切那伽咸當敬順若能日別誦持此呪。
analyzed: 一切那伽咸當敬順若能日別誦持此呪。
translated: All nāgas will all respectfully obey. If one is able to recite and uphold this mantra daily,

original: 其人功德果報不可得思不可得說。
analyzed: 其人功德果報不可得思不可得說。
translated: The merits and rewards of that person are inconceivable and indescribable.

original: 復次取新淨瓮滿盛淨水。
analyzed: 復次取新淨瓮滿盛淨水。
translated: Next, take a new, clean jar and fill it with clean water.

original: 隨其土地種種花草及諸樹等。
analyzed: 隨其土地種種花草及諸樹等。
translated: According to the characteristics of the land, take various flowers, grasses, and trees,

original: 皆取其芽嫩軟顛頭皆置瓮中。
analyzed: 皆取其芽嫩軟顛頭皆置瓮中。
translated: And take their sprouts, tender and soft, all with their tips facing down, and place them in the jar.

original: 又取因陀羅訶塞多云是人參似手未詳健平陀波囉去縛白芥子欝金花栴檀。
analyzed: 又取因陀羅訶塞多云是人參似手未詳健平陀波囉去縛白芥子欝金花栴檀。
translated: Take indrahasuta (unknown), human ginseng (unknown), and white mustard seeds, turmeric, and sandalwood.
Take these and other such excellent medicinal herbs and
put them all in water and chant the mantra ten thousand times.

original: 若在世間一切人等諸惡病痛。
analyzed: 若在世間一切人等諸惡病痛。
translated: If there are any evil illnesses among all the people in the world,
give them this to drink and bathe with.

translated: Inviting the bodhisattvas, the mantra again, inviting the bodhisattvas, there are thirty. Oṃ sarva vīra bodhaya hāra

original: 虎𤙖二合31 請一切諸天及龍咒復次請一切諸天及龍呪三十一嗚唵二合阿鞞三麼耶
analyzed: 虎𤙖二合31 請一切諸天及龍咒復次請一切諸天及龍呪三十一嗚唵二合阿鞞三麼耶
translated: Hūṃ. Inviting all the devas and nāgas. Next, the mantra for inviting all the devas and nāgas. Oṃ aṣṭamaya

original: 跋折㘑🔽陀囉陀囉嗚𤙖二合復次請四天王呪。
analyzed: 跋折㘑 陀囉陀囉嗚𤙖二合復次請四天王呪。
translated: vajra🔽dhāra dhāra hūṃ. Next, the mantra for inviting the Four Heavenly Kings.

original: 嗚唵二合麼儞毘迦皤低　嗚𤙖二合復次結護。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合麼儞毘迦皤低　嗚𤙖二合復次結護。
translated: Oṃ maṇi-vikrama-pāti hūṃ. Next, the mantra for protection.

original: 嗚唵二合輸婆麼尼　胡嚧　胡嚧　唬𤙖二合此上名呪弟子呪復次入壇持呪。🔽嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他伽跢　跋折利二合儞陀囉陀囉虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合復次送呪。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合輸婆麼尼　胡嚧　胡嚧　唬𤙖二合此上名呪弟子呪復次入壇持呪。 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他伽跢　跋折利二合儞陀囉陀囉虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合復次送呪。
translated: Oṃ śubha-maṇi hūṃ hūṃ. The above is called the disciple mantra. Next, entering the altar and reciting the mantra.🔽Oṃ sarva-tathāgata vajra-nidhāna dhāra hūṃ hūṃ. Next, the mantra for sending off.

original: 嗚唵二合比羅毘上囉時曳二合伽伽那婆呬儞囉吼囉吼　虎𤙖二合此上名呪一切處食供養呪復次送諸天呪。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合比羅毘上囉時曳二合伽伽那婆呬儞囉吼囉吼　虎𤙖二合此上名呪一切處食供養呪復次送諸天呪。
translated: Oṃ piraya viraya śrī-gaganābha-nira-hūṃ hūṃ. The above is called the mantra for all places, food offerings, and mantra. Next, the mantra for sending off the devas.

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合多他伽多屈羅嚧地丁里反低輕呼娑末囉比伽帝啜羅啜羅虎𤙖二合莎呵此上名發遣呪一切處用復次送賢聖已乞願護念呪。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合多他伽多屈羅嚧地丁里反低輕呼娑末囉比伽帝啜羅啜羅虎𤙖二合莎呵此上名發遣呪一切處用復次送賢聖已乞願護念呪。
translated: Oṃ sarvatathāgatakūṭa-arati saṃvara-samala-vigate cchvala cchvala hūṃ svāhā. This above is the dismissal mantra used everywhere. Next, after sending off the sages, the mantra for requesting their protection is:

original: 嗚唵二合末尼　蘇𤙖　婆儞平毘迦上縛底洛叉多滿虎𤙖二合其牟利曼陀囉。🔽於𠼝大曼陀羅。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合末尼　蘇𤙖　婆儞平毘迦上縛底洛叉多滿虎𤙖二合其牟利曼陀囉。 於𠼝大曼陀羅。
translated: Oṃ maṇi-soma-vaṃśe vikāsa-tala-pūrṇa hūṃ kṣaṃ mukti-mantra-loke |🔽Mahā-mantra-loke |
Upala-mahā-mantra-loke |
The functions of these three mantras are roughly like this.
If explained in detail, they cannot be exhausted.

original: 依前三呪作法畢已。🔽隨其一一欲持之者。
analyzed: 依前三呪作法畢已。 隨其一一欲持之者。
translated: After completing the rites based on the above three mantras,
one should first recite each of them 800 times.
All Dharma activities must be clearly mastered.
The other rites must be fully equipped one by one.
Then, all the spiritual responses will be accomplished.
If one is able to uphold it in this way,

original: 一切生死重罪皆悉除滅。
analyzed: 一切生死重罪皆悉除滅。
translated: all heavy offenses of birth and death will be completely eradicated.

original: 一切煩惱大海皆悉枯涸。
analyzed: 一切煩惱大海皆悉枯涸。
translated: The great ocean of all afflictions will all dry up.
Without fail, one will swiftly attain supreme enlightenment.
By diligently reciting and contemplating, one will quickly ascend to the fruit of Buddhahood.

original: 比至成佛已來功德無盡。
analyzed: 比至成佛已來功德無盡。
translated: Up to the present, the merit of becoming a Buddha is inexhaustible.
Those who recite and uphold it with a joyful mind
will certainly attain the stage of nonretrogression.
In all worlds, they will be able to turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: 烏波囉大曼陀囉功德如是。
analyzed: 烏波囉大曼陀囉功德如是。
translated: The merits of the great mantra of Uporala are like this.

original: 即說呪曰。🔽烏唵二合麼尼馱𠼝　虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲復次入道場時。
analyzed: 即說呪曰。 烏唵二合麼尼馱𠼝　虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲復次入道場時。
translated: Then, he spoke the mantra, saying:🔽U om ma ni padme hum phaṭ. Next, when entering the ritual arena, sprinkle yourself with fragrant water for purification, using the mantra:
Namaḥ samantabuddhānāṃ, arapacanāṃ, tadyathā - oṃ śodhane śodhane, viraje viraje, sarvapāpaviśodhane svāhā.

original: 嗚唵二合摩訶毘布羅鉢羅二合底丁利反瑟恥跢悉提阿鞞去詵去遮麼那迦薩囉婆二合怛他伽多毘曬罽破囉破囉三破囉虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合若入道場時。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合摩訶毘布羅鉢羅二合底丁利反瑟恥跢悉提阿鞞去詵去遮麼那迦薩囉婆二合怛他伽多毘曬罽破囉破囉三破囉虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合若入道場時。
translated: Oṃ mahā-vibhūti-padārcita-siddhi-abhiṣeka-samaya-sarva-tathāgata-viśeṣa-prabhā-pra-pra-prabhā hūṃ hūṃ If one enters the ritual arena,
take a scoop of perfumed water, recite the mantra, and sprinkle it on oneself.
It can cause all impurities to be completely purified.
After having adorned and bound, then enter the ritual arena.
Next, form the mudrā of the lotus seat mantra.

original: 嗚唵二合牟儞麼儞　鉢囉二合婆伐𠼝　矩醯破擔　麼尼波囉二合鞞莎訶去爾時拔折囉半那。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合牟儞麼儞　鉢囉二合婆伐𠼝　矩醯破擔　麼尼波囉二合鞞莎訶去爾時拔折囉半那。
translated: Oṃ muṇi maṇi-prabhāvatī-guhyapradā mani-parāvit śānta Then Vajrapāṇi,
arose from his seat and faced the Buddha.

original: 足合掌恭敬白佛言世尊。
analyzed: 足合掌恭敬白佛言世尊。
translated: Joining his palms in respect, he addressed the Buddha, saying, World-Honored One,

original: 唯願說於母陀囉法願具解。
analyzed: 唯願說於母陀囉法願具解。
translated: I only wish that you would explain the dharmas of the dhāraṇīs, and I would like to fully understand them.

original: 爾時世尊告金剛言若人誠願行此法者。
analyzed: 爾時世尊告金剛言若人誠願行此法者。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One told Vajra, If a person sincerely wishes to practice this Dharma,

original: 常當誦念牟唎曼陀囉於𠼝大曼陀囉烏波囉大曼陀羅。
analyzed: 常當誦念牟唎曼陀囉於𠼝大曼陀囉烏波囉大曼陀羅。
translated: One should always recite the mantras of Marīci, Mahāmaṇḍala, and Uparamaṇḍala.

original: 如是三呪精勤誦念勿令間斷。
analyzed: 如是三呪精勤誦念勿令間斷。
translated: One should diligently recite these three mantras without interruption.
One should also always make offerings to Vajra.

original: 供養觀世音菩薩文殊尸利菩薩彌勒菩薩尊。
analyzed: 供養觀世音菩薩文殊尸利菩薩彌勒菩薩尊。
translated: Make offerings to Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva, Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva, and Maitreya Bodhisattva.
One should also anoint the ground with fragrant mud every day.
Burn famous incense and various flowers.
Make offerings to the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas of the ten directions.
Bow with utmost sincerity three times a day.

original: 對十方佛一切菩薩金剛之前求哀懺悔。
analyzed: 對十方佛一切菩薩金剛之前求哀懺悔。
translated: Before the Buddhas and all Bodhisattvas and Vajras of the ten directions, seek forgiveness and repent.
With utmost sincerity and reverence, wish to attain the efficacy of the mantra.

original: 復次諦聽禮懺願已當知。
analyzed: 復次諦聽禮懺願已當知。
translated: Next, listen attentively to the repentance and vows.
The first mudrā:
First, sit upright with legs crossed.

original: 即以手指作母陀羅。🔽右肘當跨。
analyzed: 即以手指作母陀羅。 右肘當跨。
translated: Then use the fingers to form the mudrā.🔽The right elbow should be placed on the thigh.
Bend the index finger and press the tip of the thumb.

original: 展餘三指次展左手印押右掌引當心上至心向佛一不傾動。
analyzed: 展餘三指次展左手印押右掌引當心上至心向佛一不傾動。
translated: Extend the other three fingers, then extend the left hand, press it on the right palm, draw it to the heart, and sincerely face the Buddha without wavering.
Contemplate the Buddha's compassionate and sympathetic protection.
Contemplate like this, keeping the mind undistracted.
Hold the mudra with utmost sincerity and recite the mantra.

original: 當令滿足二十一遍即說呪曰。
analyzed: 當令滿足二十一遍即說呪曰。
translated: It should be recited twenty-one times. The mantra states:

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭跢憶唎大摩儞什伐囉二合伽儞阿比瑟跢二合耶虎𤙖二合結此印者即為得於十方一切諸佛心母陀囉無有異也。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭跢憶唎大摩儞什伐囉二合伽儞阿比瑟跢二合耶虎𤙖二合結此印者即為得於十方一切諸佛心母陀囉無有異也。
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata ākāśa mahāniśvabhraka gāni abhiṣeka ya hūṃ By forming this mudra, one will attain the mother dhāraṇī of the minds of all Buddhas in the ten directions, no different.
In the unsurpassed enlightenment of the Buddha,

original: 獲大功德福聚今為汝說。🔽若有人於百千劫恒河沙劫。
analyzed: 獲大功德福聚今為汝說。 若有人於百千劫恒河沙劫。
translated: One will obtain great merit and blessings. I will now explain it for you.
If someone were to make offerings of heaps of the seven treasures for hundreds of thousands of kalpas, as numerous as the sands in the Ganges River,
Adorning and making offerings without end, the merit and rewards obtained from such offerings,
Compared to the merit of forming the mudra and reciting the mantra,
Even a hundred thousandth of a part is not enough.
You should now know that if you wish to make a mudra,
You should purify your body and attire.

original: 以龍腦香檀香麝香塗其兩手。🔽然可恭敬。
analyzed: 以龍腦香檀香麝香塗其兩手。 然可恭敬。
translated: Smear your two hands with dragon brain incense, sandalwood incense, and musk incense.
Then you can respectfully make the above mudra.
This method can destroy all evil karma.
If there is a sick person who is about to die,

original: 得見此印其病即差還更增壽。
analyzed: 得見此印其病即差還更增壽。
translated: If they see this mudra, their illness will immediately be cured and they will live longer.
The power and merit of this mudra are like this.

original: 由是義故名為因鉢𡀔婆如意珠清淨名佛心印未詳。
analyzed: 由是義故名為因鉢𡀔婆如意珠清淨名佛心印未詳。
translated: For this reason, it is called the Buddha's Heart Mudra, which purifies the wish-fulfilling jewel.
Next, the second mudra is:

original: 左肘當跨平展仰掌。🔽即屈無名小二指。
analyzed: 左肘當跨平展仰掌。 即屈無名小二指。
translated: Place the left elbow on the hip and extend the palm upward.🔽Then bend the ring finger and little finger.
Use the tip of the thumb to press the tips of the two fingers.
Place it to the side of the heart with the head slightly lowered.
Slightly open the eyes and slightly furrow the eyebrows.
Bite the lower lip with the teeth and observe one's own body.
Fix your mind on the Buddha, not allowing it to scatter or move.
Recite and uphold this mantra twenty-one times.
Then he spoke the mantra, saying:

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他伽跢呼答反鉢囉二合毘囉迦囉麼儞虎𤙖二合結此印者。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他伽跢呼答反鉢囉二合毘囉迦囉麼儞虎𤙖二合結此印者。
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata buddha pṛthivī rakṣa maṃ hūṃ phaṭ. By forming this mudrā,

original: 即為得入十方一切諸佛法藏等無有異。
analyzed: 即為得入十方一切諸佛法藏等無有異。
translated: one will attain entry into the Dharma treasury of all buddhas in the ten directions, no different from them.

original: 亦為入於一切諸佛曼陀羅也。
analyzed: 亦為入於一切諸佛曼陀羅也。
translated: It is also entry into the maṇḍala of all buddhas.

original: 即為攝入一切諸佛眷屬。
analyzed: 即為攝入一切諸佛眷屬。
translated: It is the gathering entry into the retinue of all buddhas.

original: 如是人者百千劫來重罪惡業。
analyzed: 如是人者百千劫來重罪惡業。
translated: For such a person, heavy offenses and evil karma from hundreds of thousands of kalpas
will be completely extinguished, leaving no remaining hindrances.

original: 亦如已作十方諸佛壇印一等。
analyzed: 亦如已作十方諸佛壇印一等。
translated: It is also like having already formed the altar mudrā of the buddhas in the ten directions.

original: 若為十方所有一切作障難者。
analyzed: 若為十方所有一切作障難者。
translated: If there are any who create obstacles for all in the ten directions,

original: 若魔惡龍比怛野二合陀囉等。
analyzed: 若魔惡龍比怛野二合陀囉等。
translated: such as māras, evil dragons, and piśācas,
it is as if the mantra master were to step on their heads.
Those māras and others will be burned as if by fire.

original: 十方一切諸族種類所作障難。
analyzed: 十方一切諸族種類所作障難。
translated: All the obstacles created by the various clans in the ten directions.

original: 呪師但當以念佛心結此印者。
analyzed: 呪師但當以念佛心結此印者。
translated: The mantra practitioner should only form this mudra with the mind of mindfulness of the Buddha.

original: 是諸種族悉以胸膺著地求哀歸命。
analyzed: 是諸種族悉以胸膺著地求哀歸命。
translated: These various clans will all lower their chests to the ground, seeking mercy and taking refuge.
At that time, those clans
will see the mudra and hear the mantra, and will receive even more benefits.
Dissolving their evil minds, they will attain great blessings.

original: 由是義故名為一切諸佛心印。
analyzed: 由是義故名為一切諸佛心印。
translated: For this reason, it is called the heart mudra of all buddhas.
Next, the third mudra:
Extend the right hand, place it on the knee facing upward,
bend the middle finger to touch the tip of the thumb,
slightly lower the body and face.
Next, extend the left hand to cover the left rib,

original: 橫當心平。🔽以大指押中指無名二指甲。
analyzed: 橫當心平。 以大指押中指無名二指甲。
translated: place it horizontally in front of the chest,🔽use the thumb to press the tips of the middle and ring fingers,
straighten the index and little fingers,
make a wide open eye and stare intently without looking around.

original: 慈悲三昧心莫異念身意不動。
analyzed: 慈悲三昧心莫異念身意不動。
translated: With a mind of compassion and samādhi, do not think differently, and do not move the body or mind.
Then recite the mantra, which goes:

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他伽跢阿鞞三勃陀跋折𠼝　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合若結此印者。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他伽跢阿鞞三勃陀跋折𠼝　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合若結此印者。
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata abhiṣekha vajra hūṃ hūṃ. If one forms this mudrā,
all buddhas in the ten directions
will all praise this person with a good mind,
increasing their blessings and virtues.
All buddhas will always protect them,
just as a loving mother nurtures her beloved child.
All sages each call this person,

original: 呼云佛子汝今學習持此法故。
analyzed: 呼云佛子汝今學習持此法故。
translated: saying, Buddha's child, you are now learning and upholding this Dharma,
therefore you will become a child of all buddhas.

original: 百千那由他俱胝恒河沙數諸佛皆大歡喜。
analyzed: 百千那由他俱胝恒河沙數諸佛皆大歡喜。
translated: Hundreds of thousands of nayutas of koṭīs of Ganges sands of buddhas will all greatly rejoice,
with a joyful mind accepting you.
For this reason, you should know this mudrā
is no different from all buddhas.

original: 故號此印名為波羅薩羅摩尼矩醯摩訶母陀囉名廣大摩尼祕密印。
analyzed: 故號此印名為波羅薩羅摩尼矩醯摩訶母陀囉名廣大摩尼祕密印。
translated: Therefore this mudrā is called the Potala Mahāmaṇi Secret Mudrā.
Next, the fourth mudra:

original: 先當合掌各屈中指無名二指。
analyzed: 先當合掌各屈中指無名二指。
translated: First join the palms together, bend the middle finger and ring finger of each hand,
and double-fold the thumbs to enter inside.

original: 長展二小指似如相著似如不著。
analyzed: 長展二小指似如相著似如不著。
translated: Extend the two little fingers, appearing to touch each other but not quite touching.

original: 當其心著如小曲身小低其頭。
analyzed: 當其心著如小曲身小低其頭。
translated: Place it on the heart, slightly bend the body, and lower the head slightly.
Raise the two eyebrows, open the eyes wide,
as if gazing up in admiration, single-mindedly thinking of the Buddha.
Arouse the mind of compassion towards all sentient beings.

original: 念念相續一心一意勿令間斷。
analyzed: 念念相續一心一意勿令間斷。
translated: Continuously think of this single-mindedly, without interruption.
Then raise the mudra to the top of the head.
When about to form the mudra, recite the mantra:

original: 虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲　卍欲解印時呪曰。
analyzed: 虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲　卍欲解印時呪曰。
translated: Hum hum phaṭ (with a half-sound of cha). When wanting to untie the mudra, recite the mantra:

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他伽跢一阿地瑟旦麼儞二合虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲如是結護有大威力。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他伽跢一阿地瑟旦麼儞二合虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲如是結護有大威力。
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata ādhiṣṭhāna mahā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ (with a half-sound of cha). Forming this protection has great power and influence.

original: 由是義故名為麼訶麼尼博囉破囉底瑟旦矩醯南摩訶母陀囉大摩尼周遍住祕密印。
analyzed: 由是義故名為麼訶麼尼博囉破囉底瑟旦矩醯南摩訶母陀囉大摩尼周遍住祕密印。
translated: For this reason, it is called the great maṇi jewel, all-pervading, abiding in secret mudrā.
Next, the fifth mudrā:
One should sit in the cross-legged posture like a coiled dragon.
Join the palms in meditation and imagine one's body
To be no different from Vajra.
Then use Vajrapāṇi to rub one's head
From the crown to the feet.

original: 復作是念當願此身速坐十方。
analyzed: 復作是念當願此身速坐十方。
translated: Again, think like this: May this body quickly sit in the ten directions,
Like Vajra, like the Buddha's body.

original: 願已合掌即當結印。🔽以二大指二招指各頭相拄。
analyzed: 願已合掌即當結印。 以二大指二招指各頭相拄。
translated: After wishing, join the palms and form the mudrā.🔽With the two thumbs and two index fingers touching at the tips,

original: 交二中指屈入掌內。🔽舒二無名指令使直竪。
analyzed: 交二中指屈入掌內。 舒二無名指令使直竪。
translated: Cross the two middle fingers and bend them into the palm.🔽Extend the two ring fingers and make them stand straight.
Cross the two little fingers and bend them into the palm.

original: 便以其印拄地及左右二膝。
analyzed: 便以其印拄地及左右二膝。
translated: Then use the mudrā to touch the ground and the two knees on the left and right.
Again, from the crown down,
Use the body to rub on the left and right.

original: 訖已即以印當臍翼其二肘身如向前。
analyzed: 訖已即以印當臍翼其二肘身如向前。
translated: Having finished, place the mudra at the navel, with the two elbows supporting the body as before.
Bend down and sit, then recite the mantra, saying:

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭跢鉢囉二合皤羅二合麼尼嚕止𠼝虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲若結此印已。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭跢鉢囉二合皤羅二合麼尼嚕止𠼝虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲若結此印已。
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata pravara mahānetra hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ If one forms this mudra,
in the place where one sits, in all ten directions,
it will all become vajra, without any doubt or falsehood.
This person will be like obtaining the seat of all buddhas.

original: 彼一切魔諸惡人等不信佛者。
analyzed: 彼一切魔諸惡人等不信佛者。
translated: All māras and evil people who do not believe in the Buddha,
will not be able to see that person.

original: 由此義故名為一切諸佛金剛師子座印。
analyzed: 由此義故名為一切諸佛金剛師子座印。
translated: For this reason, it is called the mudra of the vajra lion seat of all buddhas.
Next, the sixth mudra:

original: 結加趺坐先當合掌。🔽屈二小指令背相著。
analyzed: 結加趺坐先當合掌。 屈二小指令背相著。
translated: Sit with legs crossed, first join the palms,🔽bend the two little fingers so that their backs touch each other,

original: 屈二大指各捻小指第一節側。
analyzed: 屈二大指各捻小指第一節側。
translated: and bend the two thumbs to pinch the sides of the first joints of the little fingers.

original: 交二無名指屈押二大指背上。
analyzed: 交二無名指屈押二大指背上。
translated: Cross the two nameless fingers and bend them to press on the back of the two thumbs.

original: 屈二中指令背相著各已甲側。
analyzed: 屈二中指令背相著各已甲側。
translated: Bend the two middle fingers so that the backs of the fingers touch each other, with the sides of the nails touching.
Press on the two nameless fingers.
The two index fingers
are separated and extended high, surpassing the back of the head.
Then recite the mantra, saying:

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭多毘布羅三婆鞞虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合若結此印時。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭多毘布羅三婆鞞虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合若結此印時。
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata viśva pavi hūṃ hūṃ. When this mudrā is formed,

original: 六十八千恒河沙數諸佛。🔽即同授與一切諸佛一切伏地遮反遠記。
analyzed: 六十八千恒河沙數諸佛。 即同授與一切諸佛一切伏地遮反遠記。
translated: sixty-eight thousand Ganges river sands of buddhas🔽will bestow the prediction of subduing all buddhas together.
They will bestow this person with a swift and effective prediction.

original: 是故此印名為達摩羯囉阿地瑟旦摩訶母姪囉阿世伽母達羅南。
analyzed: 是故此印名為達摩羯囉阿地瑟旦摩訶母姪囉阿世伽母達羅南。
translated: Therefore, this mudrā is called the mahāmudrā of the Dharma seal, the mahāmudrā of the great seal.
Next, the seventh mudrā:
First, join the palms and cover the heart with both hands,
with the right hand on top.

original: 次以右手大指招指甲端相拄。
analyzed: 次以右手大指招指甲端相拄。
translated: Then, with the thumb and index finger of the right hand, touch the tips of the nails together.

original: 便舉左手聚其五指如合蓮華。
analyzed: 便舉左手聚其五指如合蓮華。
translated: Then raise the left hand and gather the five fingers together like a closed lotus flower.
Turn the right hand palm up and cover the left lotus hand.
Rest it inside the palm and contemplate with loving-kindness.
Then recite the mantra, which goes:

original: 唵　薩囉婆二合怛他揭跢　三麼耶　麼儞跋折𠼝　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合一切佛同結此印方轉法輪。
analyzed: 唵　薩囉婆二合怛他揭跢　三麼耶　麼儞跋折𠼝　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合一切佛同結此印方轉法輪。
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata samaya mani vajra hūṃ hūṃ All buddhas form this mudrā together and then turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: 結此印故十方世界六種震動。
analyzed: 結此印故十方世界六種震動。
translated: By forming this mudrā, the worlds in the ten directions shake in six ways.

original: 由是義故名為一切諸佛轉法輪印。
analyzed: 由是義故名為一切諸佛轉法輪印。
translated: For this reason, it is called the mudrā of all buddhas turning the wheel of the Dharma.
Next, the eight mudrās in sequence are as follows:

original: 先結加趺坐右脚押左。🔽令左脚大指拄地端直正身。
analyzed: 先結加趺坐右脚押左。 令左脚大指拄地端直正身。
translated: First, sit in full lotus posture with the right foot pressing on the left.🔽Make the big toe of the left foot touch the ground, straighten up, and sit upright.

original: 平展右掌掩左肋下橫與臍准。
analyzed: 平展右掌掩左肋下橫與臍准。
translated: Extend the right palm flat and cover the left rib cage, level with the navel.
Then bend the index finger and pinch the joint of the thumb.
The middle [fingers] form a circle like a wheel, turn the hand palm up,
and next, form this wheel with the right hand again.
Turn the right palm up and make a great spirit.
The majestic wind faces the appearance and looks at one's own body.
Then recite the mantra, saying:

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭多誓曳伐誓曳阿折跢伐折𠼝　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合若結此印時。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭多誓曳伐誓曳阿折跢伐折𠼝　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合若結此印時。
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata śrīye vajra hūṃ hūṃ. When this mudrā is formed,

original: 十方一切諸魔及其眷屬作障難者。
analyzed: 十方一切諸魔及其眷屬作障難者。
translated: all māras and their retinues in the ten directions who create obstacles
all hide and are unable to create difficulties.

original: 一切怨家債主咸各摧伏。
analyzed: 一切怨家債主咸各摧伏。
translated: All enemies and creditors are each subdued.
All evil karma is eradicated without exception.

original: 由是力故名為阿波羅至多母達羅名無能勝符印。
analyzed: 由是力故名為阿波羅至多母達羅名無能勝符印。
translated: By this power, it is called the invincible talisman mudrā.
Next, the ninth mudrā:

original: 先合掌已以右手四指作拳。
analyzed: 先合掌已以右手四指作拳。
translated: First join the palms, then make a fist with the four fingers of the right hand,

original: 以大指捺其右肋。🔽即舉置於左手掌中。
analyzed: 以大指捺其右肋。 即舉置於左手掌中。
translated: and press the thumb against the right rib.🔽Then raise it and place it in the palm of the left hand.

original: 次以左手向上舒指承之。
analyzed: 次以左手向上舒指承之。
translated: Next, raise the left hand and extend the fingers to support it,

original: 握其右拳五指背上仰把右印。
analyzed: 握其右拳五指背上仰把右印。
translated: and grasp the back of the five fingers of the right fist, holding the right mudrā.
Then recite the mantra, saying:

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭跢達摩馱都摩訶麼儞　釋迦𠼝　訶囉　訶囉　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖泮此名一切諸佛轉輪聖王母達羅。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉婆二合怛他揭跢達摩馱都摩訶麼儞　釋迦𠼝　訶囉　訶囉　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖泮此名一切諸佛轉輪聖王母達羅。
translated: Oṃ sarva-tathāgata-dharma-dhātu-mahā-maṇi Śākyasiṃha hara hara hūṃ phaṭ This is called the mother of all buddhas and cakravartin kings.

original: 亦是十方一切諸佛母達羅。
analyzed: 亦是十方一切諸佛母達羅。
translated: It is also the mother of all buddhas in the ten directions.
Next, the ten mudrās in sequence:
First, join the palms together.

original: 雙屈無名指令背側相著。🔽屈二大指令押捻二無名指背第一節。
analyzed: 雙屈無名指令背側相著。 屈二大指令押捻二無名指背第一節。
translated: Cross the two ring fingers with the backs of the fingers touching each other.🔽Bend the two index fingers to press the backs of the two ring fingers at the first joint.

original: 即交二中指屈於無名指上。
analyzed: 即交二中指屈於無名指上。
translated: Cross the two middle fingers and bend them over the ring fingers.
The little fingers and forefingers are straight and touch each other.

original: 即從右起徐徐高舉過右肩上與頭齊已。
analyzed: 即從右起徐徐高舉過右肩上與頭齊已。
translated: Start from the right and slowly raise them up over the right shoulder to the level of the head.
Then slowly lower them and point them to the ground.
Next, bend the right knee and step on the ground with the left foot.
Glare with angry eyes and bite the lower lip.

original: 唱呷𤙖作聲作喉聲當自想念作金剛形狀瞋怒之想。
analyzed: 唱呷𤙖作聲作喉聲當自想念作金剛形狀瞋怒之想。
translated: Chant ha ha and make throat sounds, and imagine yourself in the form of Vajra with an angry thought.
Then recite this mantra:

original: 嗚唵二合杜嚕杜嚧摩儞上摩儞上摩阿苾突庾二合麼儞莎訶若結此印三十三天悉皆震動。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合杜嚕杜嚧摩儞上摩儞上摩阿苾突庾二合麼儞莎訶若結此印三十三天悉皆震動。
translated: Oṃ dūru dūru maru maru abhi turyu ma ni svāhā If you form this mudrā, the thirty-three heavens will all tremble.
All the gods and demons will
All be terrified and greatly afraid.

original: 復次第十一四天王印者。
analyzed: 復次第十一四天王印者。
translated: Next, the mudrā of the four heavenly kings in sequence is as follows:
With the right hand facing upward above the navel,
Bend the thumb and also bend the index finger,
Then bend the little finger,
And make a fist with the three fingers of the left hand,
With the thumb pointing backward and the tiger's mouth facing outward,
Press it on the right hip,

original: 招指直前大指向後寬大開眼瞻視之狀。
analyzed: 招指直前大指向後寬大開眼瞻視之狀。
translated: With the index finger straight forward and the thumb pointing backward, open the eyes wide and look around.
Then recite the mantra, saying:

original: 嗚唵二合阿上嚕嚕迦摩哩地上社耶社耶虎𤙖二合復次第十二施囉地縛印者。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合阿上嚕嚕迦摩哩地上社耶社耶虎𤙖二合復次第十二施囉地縛印者。
translated: Oṃ āru-ru-kā-ma-ri-śa-ya śa-ya hūṃ. Next, the sequence of the twelve Śrī Dīpaṃkara Buddha's mudrā:
First join the palms, bend the two thumbs,
and the remaining eight fingers are all joined like the shape of a lotus flower.
Then recite the mantra:

original: 嗚唵二合毘麼羅枳哩地上三麼囉虎𤙖二合復次第十三商企儞平印者。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合毘麼羅枳哩地上三麼囉虎𤙖二合復次第十三商企儞平印者。
translated: Oṃ vi-mā-ra-ki-ri-di-sa-ma-ra hūṃ. Next, the sequence of the thirteen Śāṃkhinī mudrā:
Raise the right hand above the right shoulder,
make a half-joined palm shape, slightly bend the thumb,
and slightly bend the index finger.

original: 餘三指相搏齊屈如斸斤形。
analyzed: 餘三指相搏齊屈如斸斤形。
translated: The remaining three fingers are interlocked and bent together like the shape of an ax.
Next, extend the left hand and cover it on the left thigh,
support the elbow, make a fearful face,
with evil eyes staring, slightly lower the head.
Then recite the mantra:

original: 嗚唵二合鄧瑟吒二合囉儞󰫎索囉　虎𤙖二合復次第十四杜地印者。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合鄧瑟吒二合囉儞󰫎索囉　虎𤙖二合復次第十四杜地印者。
translated: Oṃ de-ṣa-ra-ni-ṣo-ra hūṃ. Next, the sequence of the fourteen Dūti mudrā:
Cover and extend the right hand towards the ground.
Next, erect and extend the left hand on the shoulder.
The palm faces outward.

original: 即想見杜地面如朧長狀。
analyzed: 即想見杜地面如朧長狀。
translated: Then visualize the ground as a long shape.
Then recite the mantra called the messenger mudra.

original: 嗚唵二合阿迦儞怛底唎文闍遏地二合阿薩儞虎𤙖二合復次第十五壇中請諸天等一切時供養印者。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合阿迦儞怛底唎文闍遏地二合阿薩儞虎𤙖二合復次第十五壇中請諸天等一切時供養印者。
translated: Om agni dharmadhara asani hum. Again, in the fifteenth altar, invite the various gods and make offerings at all times. The mudra for making offerings is:
Interlock the palms facing upward like a chain.

original: 兩腕當臍平展端身正立。
analyzed: 兩腕當臍平展端身正立。
translated: The two wrists should be level with the navel. Extend the body and stand upright.
Then kneel with the left knee as if walking.
Then press the ground with the foot.
Recite the mantra, saying:

original: 嗚唵二合三曼陀阿迦囉麼哩怖囉儞吒迦吒迦虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲復次第十六優鉢羅補色波印者。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合三曼陀阿迦囉麼哩怖囉儞吒迦吒迦虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲復次第十六優鉢羅補色波印者。
translated: Om samantabhadra marichi takataka hum phaṭ. Again, in the sixteenth, the mudra of Utpala Pūṣya is:

original: 以右手五指如合蓮形狀。
analyzed: 以右手五指如合蓮形狀。
translated: With the five fingers of the right hand form the shape of a closed lotus.
Raise it up level with the left ear.

original: 次以左手亦作如蓮華形。
analyzed: 次以左手亦作如蓮華形。
translated: Next, with the left hand, also form the shape of a lotus flower.
Raise it above the heart and recite the mantra, saying:

original: 嗚唵二合薩囉薩囉毘薩囉虎𤙖二合虎𤙖此蓮華印也。🔽壇中所有一切畫蓮華者。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合薩囉薩囉毘薩囉虎𤙖二合虎𤙖此蓮華印也。 壇中所有一切畫蓮華者。
translated: Oṃ sarasavibha tra hūṃ hūṃ - this is the lotus flower mudrā.🔽All the lotus flowers drawn in the altar
Should all be sealed with this mudrā, pressing on the flowers.
If there is a vase, also seal it on top of the vase.
At that time, Vajra spoke to the Buddha, saying, World-Honored One,

original: 若欲持是牟梨曼陀羅者。🔽復欲持是於𠼝大曼陀囉者。
analyzed: 若欲持是牟梨曼陀羅者。 復欲持是於𠼝大曼陀囉者。
translated: If one wishes to uphold this Mūlīmaṇḍala,🔽And also wishes to uphold this in the great maṇḍala,

original: 復次持是烏波羅大曼陀囉者。
analyzed: 復次持是烏波羅大曼陀囉者。
translated: And further, to uphold this in the Uparāmaṇḍala,
How are the three mudrās established?
I only wish that the World-Honored One would explain it for me.
The Buddha said, Listen attentively, I will now explain it for you.

original: 其牟𠼝曼陀囉母陀囉者。🔽先以兩手合掌當心。🔽即各屈其大指。
analyzed: 其牟𠼝曼陀囉母陀囉者。 先以兩手合掌當心。 即各屈其大指。
translated: As for the mudrā of the Mūlīmaṇḍala,🔽First, join the palms together in front of the chest,🔽Then bend the two thumbs,
And also bend the index fingers so that the tips of the nails touch each other.
The two little fingers are erected and joined together.

original: 其中指無名指各相交入內。
analyzed: 其中指無名指各相交入內。
translated: The middle fingers and ring fingers are crossed and inserted inside.

original: 其牟𠼝母陀囉者。🔽法當如是誦持作法。
analyzed: 其牟𠼝母陀囉者。 法當如是誦持作法。
translated: As for the mudra of Mahāmaṇḍala,
one should recite and practice in accordance with the Dharma as explained above.

original: 復次其於心印𠼝大曼陀囉母陀羅者。
analyzed: 復次其於心印𠼝大曼陀囉母陀羅者。
translated: Furthermore, as for the mudra of the mind, Mahāmaṇḍala,

original: 右手大指無名指頭兩相捻。
analyzed: 右手大指無名指頭兩相捻。
translated: with the right hand, the thumb and ring finger touch each other at the tips,
and the other fingers are straight and extended, facing upward and placed above the heart.
With the left hand, the thumb pinches the tip of the little finger,
and the other fingers are extended and face upward on the left knee.
As for the Dharma of Mahāmaṇḍala,

original: 當如是誦持作法如上所說。
analyzed: 當如是誦持作法如上所說。
translated: one should recite and practice in accordance with the Dharma as explained above.

original: 復次其烏隨心波囉母陀羅者母陀羅者。
analyzed: 復次其烏隨心波囉母陀羅者母陀羅者。
translated: Furthermore, as for the mudra of Ucchuṣma's mind, Parāmudrā,
with the right hand, the thumb pinches the tip of the ring finger,
and the three fingers are extended and face upward, placed horizontally at the heart.
With the left hand facing upward on the left knee,
the index finger is bent at one joint and the rest are extended.
The method of the great mother dharani of Ucchusma,

original: 當如是誦持作法如上所說。
analyzed: 當如是誦持作法如上所說。
translated: One should recite and uphold it like this, and perform the method as explained above.
Moreover, you should know that for one who upholds this mudra,

original: 一切世間所有事業無不成辦。
analyzed: 一切世間所有事業無不成辦。
translated: All worldly affairs will be accomplished without fail.
There is no great sin that cannot be eradicated.
The amount of blessings and merits one will obtain,
Except for the Buddha, no one can speak of it.

original: 若復有人隨所在處結是三印。
analyzed: 若復有人隨所在處結是三印。
translated: If there is a person who forms these three mudras wherever they may be,

original: 當知此地如有佛塔全身舍利。
analyzed: 當知此地如有佛塔全身舍利。
translated: Know that this place will be as if there is a Buddha stupa with the entire body relics.

original: 持是法者十方一切諸天護世四王。
analyzed: 持是法者十方一切諸天護世四王。
translated: Those who uphold this Dharma will be protected by all the devas, world guardians, and the Four Heavenly Kings in the ten directions.
They should make offerings and pay respect.

original: 此人亦如供養如來舍利等塔無有異也。
analyzed: 此人亦如供養如來舍利等塔無有異也。
translated: This person will also be no different from making offerings to the stupa of the Tathagata's relics.
Next, I will tell you the mantra for burning offerings.

original: 於一一法欲求一切令効驗者。
analyzed: 於一一法欲求一切令効驗者。
translated: If you wish to seek all kinds of efficacy in each and every Dharma,
And for the sake of benefiting and delighting all sentient beings,
You should first chant over food and burn it as an offering.
One should protect one's body, speech, and mind, and be extremely pure.
Then, he spoke the mantra, saying:

original: 嗚唵二合莎長訶破吒布𡀔步皤　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲莎訶若用是呪呪烏麻及白芥子。
analyzed: 嗚唵二合莎長訶破吒布𡀔步皤　虎𤙖二合虎𤙖二合泮吒吒半聲莎訶若用是呪呪烏麻及白芥子。
translated: Oṃ svāhā pūrvā pūrvā hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā If one uses this mantra to enchant black sesame seeds and white mustard seeds,
and cow ghee, and enchants them 8,000 times,

original: 燒之供養一切呪法即得効驗。
analyzed: 燒之供養一切呪法即得効驗。
translated: and burns them as offerings, all mantra methods will then be effective.

original: 又能除滅自身他身一切障難自他所有一切惡夢一切災禍亦皆除滅。
analyzed: 又能除滅自身他身一切障難自他所有一切惡夢一切災禍亦皆除滅。
translated: It can also eliminate all obstacles and difficulties for oneself and others, and all bad dreams and calamities will also be eliminated.

original: 又取牛酥安悉香白芥子等共呪八千遍。
analyzed: 又取牛酥安悉香白芥子等共呪八千遍。
translated: Also, take cow ghee, agalloch incense, white mustard seeds, and so on, and enchant them 8,000 times.
Enchanting and burning each time, in this way, after burning,

original: 一切伽嚛訶諸惡鬼神等。
analyzed: 一切伽嚛訶諸惡鬼神等。
translated: all evil ghosts and spirits such as ghouls,
will all have their heads split into two parts.
It can cure all illnesses and make them all recover.
Also, burn cow ghee together with white mustard seeds,

original: 即能降伏一切諸魔一切繫那伐也。
analyzed: 即能降伏一切諸魔一切繫那伐也。
translated: then one will be able to subdue all demons and all nāgas.

original: 又取白芥子共牛酥呪之燒已。
analyzed: 又取白芥子共牛酥呪之燒已。
translated: Furthermore, take white mustard seeds and ghee, chant over them and burn them.

original: 入一切娑那中賊無能見者。
analyzed: 入一切娑那中賊無能見者。
translated: Enter all saṃnāhas, thieves will not be able to see.

original: 又取提婆達迦木松木塗牛酥。
analyzed: 又取提婆達迦木松木塗牛酥。
translated: Furthermore, take devadāru wood and pine wood, smear them with ghee,
chant the name of a rāja and burn them.

original: 彼曷囉闍即喚對面所求皆順。
analyzed: 彼曷囉闍即喚對面所求皆順。
translated: That rāja will immediately summon and face what is sought, all will comply.
Furthermore, on the peak of a mountain,

original: 取稍去和因柘囉白芥子牛酥等。
analyzed: 取稍去和因柘囉白芥子牛酥等。
translated: take śigru, and mix it with inda, white mustard seeds, and ghee,
chant and burn it.

original: 即見一切阿素洛宮無有障礙。
analyzed: 即見一切阿素洛宮無有障礙。
translated: One will then see all the asura palaces without obstruction.

original: 即得於一切持呪法中為曷囉闍。
analyzed: 即得於一切持呪法中為曷囉闍。
translated: One will then be able to become a rāja in all mantra methods.

original: 又以白芥子脂共那伽鷄薩呪而燒者。
analyzed: 又以白芥子脂共那伽鷄薩呪而燒者。
translated: Furthermore, take white mustard seeds and fat, chant the mantra of nāga-kīla and burn them.
All nāgas will all submit.

original: 又以供佛淨齋食呪而燒者。
analyzed: 又以供佛淨齋食呪而燒者。
translated: Furthermore, take pure food offered to the Buddha and chant over it while burning it.
Whether for oneself or for others,

original: 須各稱名一一燒之能令五穀一切豐足。
analyzed: 須各稱名一一燒之能令五穀一切豐足。
translated: each must be chanted by name and burned one by one, which can cause all grains to be abundant.
Furthermore, chant over salt and burn it.

original: 即使一切藥叉惡鬼神等。
analyzed: 即使一切藥叉惡鬼神等。
translated: Even all the yakṣas, evil ghosts and spirits,
with their heads below and chests on the ground,
beg for their lives and all submit.
They will faithfully follow any instructions given.

original: 又取粳米共牛酥呪而燒之。
analyzed: 又取粳米共牛酥呪而燒之。
translated: Also, take some rice and ghee, chant the mantra over them and burn them.
It will cause the treasury to be filled.
All wealth and possessions will naturally become abundant.

original: 又面向東方呪胡椒燒之。
analyzed: 又面向東方呪胡椒燒之。
translated: Also, facing east, chant the mantra over black pepper and burn it.

original: 能令一切諸天咸悉歡喜。
analyzed: 能令一切諸天咸悉歡喜。
translated: It can cause all the gods to be delighted.
Any wishes one makes will be fulfilled.

original: 一切諸天悉皆喜見是人。🔽又若對失唎提縛平前。
analyzed: 一切諸天悉皆喜見是人。 又若對失唎提縛平前。
translated: All the gods will be delighted to see this person.🔽Also, if one faces Śiva,

original: 取黑胡麻白芥子呪而燒之。
analyzed: 取黑胡麻白芥子呪而燒之。
translated: take some black sesame seeds and white mustard seeds, chant the mantra over them and burn them.
All wishes will be fulfilled as desired.
Also, take eight thousand pieces of agarwood,
each one foot long, chant the mantra over them and burn them.
All the buddhas and the assembly of bodhisattvas
will always remember this person with compassion.
Causing all their karmic offenses to be completely eradicated.
Causing all their mantra methods to be effective.
Causing all their illnesses and suffering to be completely removed from their bodies.

original: 一切世間諸苦煩惱悉皆殄盡。
analyzed: 一切世間諸苦煩惱悉皆殄盡。
translated: Causing all the suffering and afflictions in the world to be completely extinguished.
Never again to receive a body born from a womb.
By the awesome spiritual power of reciting and upholding this mantra,

original: 常得生諸佛淨土蓮華中生。
analyzed: 常得生諸佛淨土蓮華中生。
translated: One will always be born in the pure lands of the buddhas, born from a lotus flower.
Always sharing the bliss and happiness of the buddhas.

original: 燒此木故一切惡夢一切變怪。
analyzed: 燒此木故一切惡夢一切變怪。
translated: By burning this wood, all bad dreams and strange occurrences,
All enemies will be scattered and destroyed.
All the ghosts and spirits that harm people,
Will all be naturally destroyed and restored to their original state.

original: 所有一切諸魔厄難皆悉除滅。
analyzed: 所有一切諸魔厄難皆悉除滅。
translated: All the calamities and difficulties caused by demons will be completely eliminated.
Next, I will now explain the method of painting the image.
Take a new white cloth that has never been cut or soiled,
And make it according to your ability, large or small, square in shape.
The painter, after finishing the painting,

original: 不食五辛酒肉婬欲等事。
analyzed: 不食五辛酒肉婬欲等事。
translated: Should not eat the five pungent herbs, alcohol, meat, or engage in sexual activities.
The colors used must be new and in fresh containers.
Do not use animal glue, but use fragrant glue instead.
In the center of the cloth, paint the Buddha.
Sitting on a lion throne,
Adorned with various necklaces.
Above his head in the sky, paint a banner and canopy.
The form and posture of the image should be as if expounding the Dharma.

original: 其佛右邊畫作十二臂金剛像。
analyzed: 其佛右邊畫作十二臂金剛像。
translated: To the right of the Buddha, paint a twelve-armed Vajra image.
With a reddish-white flesh color.
Each hand holding various weapons.
It should have four faces.

original: 前正一面作慈悲面。🔽左邊一面作可畏瞋面。
analyzed: 前正一面作慈悲面。 左邊一面作可畏瞋面。
translated: The main front face has a compassionate and kind expression.🔽The left side face has a terrifying and angry expression.

original: 右邊一面作狗牙上出瞋面。
analyzed: 右邊一面作狗牙上出瞋面。
translated: The right side face has an expression of bared fangs and anger.

original: 第四一面作皺眉可畏面髮皆上聳。
analyzed: 第四一面作皺眉可畏面髮皆上聳。
translated: The fourth face has a frowning and terrifying expression with hair standing on end.

original: 各以華鬘攬括束其髮居蓮華座。
analyzed: 各以華鬘攬括束其髮居蓮華座。
translated: Each wears a flower garland tied up in their hair, sitting on a lotus seat.
One leg is bent up, the other leg is hanging down.

original: 其佛左邊作摩尼伐折囉菩薩。
analyzed: 其佛左邊作摩尼伐折囉菩薩。
translated: To the left of the Buddha, paint the Bodhisattva Maṇibhadra.
Should have four sides and sixteen arms.

original: 右手把如意珠如奉佛勢。
analyzed: 右手把如意珠如奉佛勢。
translated: The right hand holds a wish-fulfilling jewel as if offering to the Buddha.
The left hand holds a lotus flower.
The two hands are turned upward with the five fingers spread out.
The two hands are joined in añjali.
One hand holds a khakkhara staff, the other hand holds a wheel.

original: 第三一手把合蓮華第四一手把數珠未詳第五一手把羂索第六一手把阿迦囉低刀也第七一手把兩頭鐵鎚第八一手把須彌山。
analyzed: 第三一手把合蓮華第四一手把數珠未詳第五一手把羂索第六一手把阿迦囉低刀也第七一手把兩頭鐵鎚第八一手把須彌山。
translated: The third hand holds a closed lotus flower, the fourth hand holds a rosary (not yet known), the fifth hand holds a noose, the sixth hand holds an akṣamālā knife, the seventh hand holds a double-headed iron hammer, and the eighth hand holds Mount Sumeru.

original: 第九一手把窣堵波第十一手把貝經夾。
analyzed: 第九一手把窣堵波第十一手把貝經夾。
translated: The ninth hand holds a stūpa, the eleventh hand holds a conch and sutra case.
The front side should have a compassionate face.

original: 右邊一面作摩訶迦囉天面。
analyzed: 右邊一面作摩訶迦囉天面。
translated: The right side face should be the face of Mahākāla.

original: 左邊一面作半師子面半人面狀。
analyzed: 左邊一面作半師子面半人面狀。
translated: The left side face should be half a lion face and half a human face.

original: 第四面作皺眉露齒瞋面。
analyzed: 第四面作皺眉露齒瞋面。
translated: The fourth face should have furrowed brows, bared fangs, and an angry expression.

original: 其面作不淺不深綠色可畏相貌。
analyzed: 其面作不淺不深綠色可畏相貌。
translated: The face should have a deep green color, with a frightening appearance, neither too shallow nor too deep.

original: 一脚屈上一脚垂下居蓮華座。
analyzed: 一脚屈上一脚垂下居蓮華座。
translated: One leg is bent up, the other leg hangs down, sitting on a lotus seat.
Under the seat, close to the front,
make an image of Śāntī.
Sitting with both knees on the ground.

original: 其有八臂手中擎華供養於佛。
analyzed: 其有八臂手中擎華供養於佛。
translated: With eight arms, holding flowers in the hands to make offerings to the Buddha.
Under the vajra seat on the right side,
make Mahādeva and Śīladeva.
As for Mahādeva,

original: 兩手捧鉢盛種種寶物奉上於佛。
analyzed: 兩手捧鉢盛種種寶物奉上於佛。
translated: with both hands holding a bowl filled with various precious objects, offering them to the Buddha.
After Mahādeva,
make Śatadru-deva.

original: 作笑面有其四手種種瓔珞莊嚴其身。
analyzed: 作笑面有其四手種種瓔珞莊嚴其身。
translated: With a smiling face, having four hands, various necklaces adorning the body.
In the hands, each holding a weapon.
After Śāntī,
make Pṛthivī.
Wearing white clothes, holding flowers in the hands.
Gazing up at the Buddha's face.

original: 其佛座下別作七寶蓮華。
analyzed: 其佛座下別作七寶蓮華。
translated: Under the Buddha's seat, separately make a seven-jeweled lotus flower.
The flower stem is shaped like beryl.
Complete with a hundred petals.
In the center of the flower, make a platform of pure gold.
Make it extremely clear and distinct.
Below the flower, make the Four Heavenly Kings.
With golden necklaces and various adornments,
their bodies clad in armor.
Below the flower stem, make a pool of water.

original: 四欄楯雜寶填廁種種莊飾。
analyzed: 四欄楯雜寶填廁種種莊飾。
translated: With four railings filled with various treasures, adorned in various ways.

original: 池岸之上作多眾白衣仙人。
analyzed: 池岸之上作多眾白衣仙人。
translated: On the banks of the pool, make many white-robed ascetics.
All kneeling to the right, gazing up at the Buddha's face.
Holding incense, holding flowers, or holding a rosary,
each with different adornments, making offerings.

original: 其佛幢蓋之上作摩訶提婆及其眷屬。
analyzed: 其佛幢蓋之上作摩訶提婆及其眷屬。
translated: Above the Buddha's banner and canopy, make Mahādeva and his retinue.
Also make Brahmā Heaven and his retinue.
Also make Nārāyaṇa and his retinue.

original: 其諸天等各執種種異華等。
analyzed: 其諸天等各執種種異華等。
translated: The various gods each hold various different flowers, etc.
Hovering in the sky, offering canopies and making offerings.
The layout and rules are like this.
Moreover, the person who holds the mantra, with body, mind, and speech,

original: 及其衣服極須護淨唯三白食。
analyzed: 及其衣服極須護淨唯三白食。
translated: And their clothes must be extremely pure. Only eat the three white foods.
From the eighth day to the fifteenth day of the month,

original: 應當像前誦持是呪滿十萬遍。
analyzed: 應當像前誦持是呪滿十萬遍。
translated: One should recite this mantra in front of the image, completing one hundred thousand recitations.
The image will then shake.
Fire will appear on the body of the mantra practitioner.
When this is accomplished, one will attain the heavenly eye.

original: 復得比皤上音陀麼里闍哩跢囉三昧。
analyzed: 復得比皤上音陀麼里闍哩跢囉三昧。
translated: And attain the samādhi of pi po ta mo li jia li da la.
Among all mantra recitations,
One becomes a wheel-turning king.

original: 十方三世諸佛皆悉得見。
analyzed: 十方三世諸佛皆悉得見。
translated: All buddhas of the ten directions and three times are all seen.

original: 持此呪者能令一切諸惡道苦皆悉除滅。
analyzed: 持此呪者能令一切諸惡道苦皆悉除滅。
translated: Those who uphold this mantra can eliminate all the sufferings of the evil destinies.

original: 遠離三毒所求一切功德。
analyzed: 遠離三毒所求一切功德。
translated: Far away from the three poisons, all the merits sought
Will be accomplished without obstruction.
One will be delighted by the Buddha and accepted by him.
All bodhisattvas will praise and extol it.

original: 十方一切天龍夜叉健達縛阿素洛迦路洛緊那羅摩睺羅伽人非人等。
analyzed: 十方一切天龍夜叉健達縛阿素洛迦路洛緊那羅摩睺羅伽人非人等。
translated: All devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, non-humans, etc. of the ten directions,
All should respectfully make offerings to this person.

original: 於一切眾生中而得自在。
analyzed: 於一切眾生中而得自在。
translated: One will attain mastery over all sentient beings.

original: 於一切事業中而得勝上。
analyzed: 於一切事業中而得勝上。
translated: One will attain supremacy over all activities.
If one is able to practice in accordance with the Dharma,
One will obtain the merit and virtue as mentioned above.
If one recites this mantra or forms this mudra,

original: 乃至若見若聞而能發心。
analyzed: 乃至若見若聞而能發心。
translated: Even if one sees or hears it, one will be able to arouse the mind of faith,
Respect and joy, and give rise to reverence.
One should praise and admire such people.
They are no different from the Buddha's body.

original: 如是人者世世常遊諸佛淨土。
analyzed: 如是人者世世常遊諸佛淨土。
translated: Such people will always roam in the pure lands of the buddhas in every lifetime.
They will not enter the womb but be born from a lotus flower.
Up to attaining the unsurpassed path,
They will always be inseparable from the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: 復次常燒薰陸香供養諸佛。
analyzed: 復次常燒薰陸香供養諸佛。
translated: Furthermore, always burn frankincense as an offering to the buddhas,

original: 及燒塞北哩香苜蓿香栴檀香沈水香多伽羅香堵嚕色迦香。
analyzed: 及燒塞北哩香苜蓿香栴檀香沈水香多伽羅香堵嚕色迦香。
translated: And burn sandalwood, aloe, agarwood, olibanum, and tagara incense.
Burning such incense as an offering,
Next, the method of anointing the altar.

original: 當用麝香龍腦香欝金香白檀香紫檀等末。
analyzed: 當用麝香龍腦香欝金香白檀香紫檀等末。
translated: One should use musk, sandalwood, saffron, white sandalwood, purple sandalwood, etc.
Anoint and decorate like this.
Next, the method of establishing boundaries.

original: 如前以說汝今諦聽持呪之法。
analyzed: 如前以說汝今諦聽持呪之法。
translated: As previously explained, you should now listen attentively to the method of upholding mantras.
First, one must bathe and make offerings to the Buddha.
After making offerings, in the place of practice,
there are earth gods who protect the boundaries.
Next, one should make offerings.
Next, if one wishes to temporarily establish boundaries,
one should first inform the Three Jewels.
Now, for the sake of a certain matter, I will establish boundaries here.
For several days, I request temporary borrowing.
For all the matters to be performed,
one should do them all within the mind of mindfulness of the Buddha.

original: 次當用塞溥陟莎悉底加印印之。
analyzed: 次當用塞溥陟莎悉底加印印之。
translated: Next, one should use the Saṃpuṭa Cāṣṭa Seal to seal it.
This seal is lacking, but one requests to move the place.

original: 所謂諸神次以波曇印安其神。
analyzed: 所謂諸神次以波曇印安其神。
translated: The so-called various gods next place the Pāṭa Seal on the gods.
Place them in a separate location outside the boundaries.

original: 其諸飲食各取少分奉施此神。
analyzed: 其諸飲食各取少分奉施此神。
translated: Take a small portion of the food and drink and offer it to this deity.
One should make offerings like this every day.

original: 復次所有小呪日別用者。
analyzed: 復次所有小呪日別用者。
translated: Next, for any minor spells to be used daily,
one should first recite each one 800 times.
Then one may use them.

original: 依如是法決定有驗。🔽次當作十方結界已。
analyzed: 依如是法決定有驗。 次當作十方結界已。
translated: If one follows this method, the spells will definitely be effective.
Next, one should form the boundary in the ten directions and then kneel in front of the Buddha, confessing from the heart.
All evil thoughts and unwholesome deeds of the three karmas,

original: 根本罪業當悉懺悔。🔽淨三業已即發弘誓。
analyzed: 根本罪業當悉懺悔。 淨三業已即發弘誓。
translated: and the fundamental evil karma, one should repent of them all.

original: 願我某甲今於佛前奉持是呪。
analyzed: 願我某甲今於佛前奉持是呪。
translated: After purifying the three karmas, one should make a great vow, saying, I, so-and-so, now uphold this spell in front of the Buddha.
If my wish is not fulfilled, I will never give up.

original: 作是誓已自量身力限其遍數。
analyzed: 作是誓已自量身力限其遍數。
translated: Having made this vow, one should estimate one's physical strength and set a number of recitations.

original: 佛前端坐身心不動日日誦持要充其限。
analyzed: 佛前端坐身心不動日日誦持要充其限。
translated: Sitting in front of the Buddha with body and mind unmoving, one should recite daily until the set number is reached.
In the first part of the day and in the second part of the day,
one should make sure to complete the set number of recitations and not neglect the practice.

original: 常以堅固不動之心而誦持之。
analyzed: 常以堅固不動之心而誦持之。
translated: Always recite it with a firm and unmoving mind.

original: 復次其地初首結界作法畢以。
analyzed: 復次其地初首結界作法畢以。
translated: Next, after the initial boundary-binding ritual is completed,
the second ritual should be performed in a separate location.

original: 第三始得更於初地作法。
analyzed: 第三始得更於初地作法。
translated: Only then can the ritual be performed again at the initial site.

original: 若不經於別處間作法者。
analyzed: 若不經於別處間作法者。
translated: If the ritual is not performed in a separate location in between,
the initial site cannot be used again.
The number of recitations for each subsequent ritual
is completed. When it is time to rise,
each one should inform the Buddha.

original: 白以念言願我後來速滿其願。
analyzed: 白以念言願我後來速滿其願。
translated: With the thought of informing, may my later wishes be quickly fulfilled.
After making such a wish, pay homage and withdraw.
From the time of entering the altar and completing the duties,

original: 若不作披衣去比陀耶二合達甲鎧心者。
analyzed: 若不作披衣去比陀耶二合達甲鎧心者。
translated: if one does not don the armor of the kṛpāṇadāka mind,

original: 即不得誦亦不能終其遍數。
analyzed: 即不得誦亦不能終其遍數。
translated: one will not be able to recite and will not be able to complete the number of recitations.
Up to paying homage to the Buddha, making offerings, and making wishes,
all should be done in the mind through contemplation.
One should face the right side of the place where the Dharma is established.

original: 刈取達比草茅草未詳端坐其上作慈眼視。
analyzed: 刈取達比草茅草未詳端坐其上作慈眼視。
translated: Cut and gather darbha grass and kuśa grass (uncertain), sit upright upon it, and with compassionate eyes,
neither too loose nor too tight, neither too small nor too large,
with a gentle appearance, sincere thoughts, and right mindfulness,
not grasping at the thoughts of the five heinous crimes,
but single-mindedly focusing the mind on the Buddha,
clearly contemplating the Buddha with an unmoving mind,
imagining the Buddha's excellent characteristics and radiance shining brightly,

original: 照見佛意大慈悲儼然猶如慈父愍護於我捧心渴仰倍自嚴勵唯除手指自外勿動。
analyzed: 照見佛意大慈悲儼然猶如慈父愍護於我捧心渴仰倍自嚴勵唯除手指自外勿動。
translated: illuminating the Buddha's compassionate and benevolent mind, as if it were a compassionate father protecting and caring for oneself, holding the mind in anticipation, redoubling one's efforts, except for the fingers, do not move.
Place the hand on the heart and turn the beads to count.
If the limit has not been reached, do not stop for a moment.

original: 欲涕唾者右手捻記要不暫放。
analyzed: 欲涕唾者右手捻記要不暫放。
translated: If one wishes to spit, pinch the hand with the right hand and do not let go for a moment.
Until the number is reached, do not stop reciting.

original: 每誦呪時常作念佛心中誦之。
analyzed: 每誦呪時常作念佛心中誦之。
translated: Every time one recites the mantra, always contemplate the Buddha in the mind while reciting.
The words and phrases of the mantra should be clear and distinct.
The length and pitch should be correct without error.
Harmonize the sound to make it warm and smooth.
Even when understanding the sound, do not be negligent or mistaken.

original: 復次若有火燒而供養者。
analyzed: 復次若有火燒而供養者。
translated: Furthermore, if there is burning as an offering,
all must inform the Buddha and swear to the limit.
Once this limit is set, do not violate it.

original: 若不燒供養即不得誦呪。🔽復次若於起貪欲心。
analyzed: 若不燒供養即不得誦呪。 復次若於起貪欲心。
translated: If one does not burn as an offering, one should not recite the mantra.
Furthermore, if one recites the mantra with a mind of greed and seeks for efficacy,
in the future one will become a seed of the yakṣa class.

original: 若於無智心中而誦呪求索驗者。
analyzed: 若於無智心中而誦呪求索驗者。
translated: If one recites the mantra with an ignorant mind and seeks for efficacy,
in the future one will become a seed of the ghost class.

original: 若於慈愍之心大慈悲心念佛之心。
analyzed: 若於慈愍之心大慈悲心念佛之心。
translated: If one recites the mantra with a mind of compassion, a mind of great compassion, and a mind of mindfulness of the Buddha,

original: 如是心中誦呪乞効驗者。
analyzed: 如是心中誦呪乞効驗者。
translated: in such a mind one recites the mantra and seeks for efficacy.
In the future one will attain the wisdom-seed of the Tathāgata.
Whatever one does will be unobstructed.
All will be accomplished as explained above.

original: 復次或欲睡眠頻申欠呿謦𠺡洟唾。
analyzed: 復次或欲睡眠頻申欠呿謦𠺡洟唾。
translated: Furthermore, if one wishes to sleep, yawn, stretch, belch, spit,
and adjust one's body and offerings,
All uneasy thoughts and concerns arise secretly.
Then do not recite the mantra.
You should earnestly focus your mind on the Buddha with reverence.
Concentrate your thoughts and contemplate correctly with utmost sincerity.
When your mind and thoughts are pure, you may then recite the mantra.
If you need to urinate or defecate,

original: 呪水一掬二十一遍想月臨照。
analyzed: 呪水一掬二十一遍想月臨照。
translated: recite the mantra over a scoop of water twenty-one times and imagine the moon shining down on you.
Sprinkle your head, body, and clothes with the water.
All impurities will be cleansed and purified.

original: 復次若有事難要須起往。
analyzed: 復次若有事難要須起往。
translated: Furthermore, if there is an urgent matter that requires you to go out,

original: 而其遍數限由未足迴還之際。
analyzed: 而其遍數限由未足迴還之際。
translated: and the number of recitations has not yet been completed, when you return,
at sunset, focus your mind on the Buddha.
Recite this mantra one hundred and eight times.
By doing this practice, you will have completed the required number of recitations.
If there is an urgent matter and you miss a day,
you should triple the number of mantra recitations as usual.

original: 復次若所求願未驗已來。
analyzed: 復次若所求願未驗已來。
translated: Furthermore, if your wishes have not yet been fulfilled,
you should not sit or lie down on nice beds or cushions.
If you have already used them, you should perform the following practice.
When the sun is about to rise, face east with palms joined.

original: 端身正立一心念佛誦呪八遍。
analyzed: 端身正立一心念佛誦呪八遍。
translated: Stand with body straight, single-mindedly contemplate the Buddha, and recite the mantra eight times.
The hindrances of arrogance will then be eliminated.
If one gives rise to thoughts of desire and leaks impure fluids,

original: 應淨洗浴心中念誦持呪一百八遍。
analyzed: 應淨洗浴心中念誦持呪一百八遍。
translated: One should wash oneself and recite the mantra one hundred and eight times in the mind.
It will be as clean as before and not lose its purity.
Next, one should know the method of using wood.

original: 云何木者能令諸法速成吉驗。
analyzed: 云何木者能令諸法速成吉驗。
translated: How can wood make all dharmas quickly accomplished and auspicious?

original: 云何木者能令諸法敗壞無驗。
analyzed: 云何木者能令諸法敗壞無驗。
translated: How can wood make all dharmas fail and have no effect?

original: 云何其火爐法云何其火相法。
analyzed: 云何其火爐法云何其火相法。
translated: What is the method of the fire stove? What are the characteristics of the fire?
If one does not know, everything will not be accomplished.

If a good man should know,

analyzed: 其注露多木牟素佉木云甘草居𠻱二合迦等木云李木迦耽婆木阿輸迦木舍唎般那木薔薇波迦沙木。
translated: The wood of the tree called jujube, the wood of the tree called licorice, the wood of the tree called plum, the wood of the tree called jujube, the wood of the tree called ashoka, the wood of the tree called rose, the wood of the tree called pomegranate.

original: 如是等木為求一切驗者用之。
analyzed: 如是等木為求一切驗者用之。
translated: Such woods are used by those seeking all kinds of accomplishments.
Because they can cause all that is sought to be accomplished.
Next, one should know that the various woods, etc.,
Should not be used if they are burned or withered.
If they are broken by themselves or snapped,

original: 瘡痕斫者已遭霜者被虫食者。
analyzed: 瘡痕斫者已遭霜者被虫食者。
translated: If they have wounds or scars, if they have been frosted, or if they have been eaten by insects.

original: 有如是等不善相者並不應用。
analyzed: 有如是等不善相者並不應用。
translated: If they have such unfavorable signs, they should not be used at all.
If there are no named dharmas, they should be used.
The various kinds of wood have four kinds of appearances.
As explained, the uses should not be mistaken.

original: 復次當知第一上法第二中法。
analyzed: 復次當知第一上法第二中法。
translated: Next, one should know that the first is the supreme dharma, the second is the middling dharma,
The third is the inferior dharma, and the fourth is the dharma of pursuit.
The four dharmas, long and short, each have their sequence.
For using the supreme dharma, it is twelve fingers long.
For the middle method, the wick should be ten fingers long.
For the following method, it should be eight fingers long.
For the lower method, it should be cut to four fingers.
Next, one should know the upper method.
It is for causing all those who are not yet close friends to become so.

original: 其中法者謂求持呪滿大願者。
analyzed: 其中法者謂求持呪滿大願者。
translated: The middle method is for those who seek to fulfill their great vows by upholding mantras.

original: 求人求財凡一切求令法驗故。
analyzed: 求人求財凡一切求令法驗故。
translated: It is for seeking people, seeking wealth, and for all kinds of seeking to make the Dharma effective.

original: 其下法者謂令一切人等敬重相憐愍故。
analyzed: 其下法者謂令一切人等敬重相憐愍故。
translated: The lower method is for causing all people to respect and have compassion for each other.

original: 其逐法者謂去一切怨家等故。🔽復次其上法者當以脂塗。
analyzed: 其逐法者謂去一切怨家等故。 復次其上法者當以脂塗。
translated: The following method is for removing all enemies and so forth.🔽Next, for the upper method, one should smear it with fat.
For the middle method, one should smear it with milk and curd.

original: 其下法者為憐愍故一種甜塗。
analyzed: 其下法者為憐愍故一種甜塗。
translated: For the lower method, out of compassion, one should smear it with a single sweet substance.

original: 其逐法者八脂血及毒藥以是而塗。
analyzed: 其逐法者八脂血及毒藥以是而塗。
translated: For the following method, one should smear it with the eight fats, blood, and poisonous substances.
Next, one should know the method for making the hearth.
Dig out miscellaneous dirty soil one cubit into the ground.
Purify it with the five flavors of the cow.

original: 填覆淨土欲求大願為上爐者。
analyzed: 填覆淨土欲求大願為上爐者。
translated: If you wish to make a large upper furnace for filling and covering the pure land and seeking great vows,
make it one cubit square and four-sided.
Build it with four layers of mud.
Then use hand seals, recite the Buddha's name, and chant the mantra.
Invite the five spirits and seat them in the furnace.
After placing the furnace spirits, chant and burn offerings.
If you wish to seek verification and make a middle furnace,

original: 其爐辟方應二十指作三重緣。
analyzed: 其爐辟方應二十指作三重緣。
translated: the furnace should be twenty fingers square and made with three layers of mud.
Dig and invite the spirits as above, without difference.
If you wish to seek compassion and make a lower furnace,
make it nine fingers high and triangular.
Each side is eighteen fingers wide.
Make its three layers, the rest as explained above.
If you wish to seek to chase after and make a furnace for that,
make it nine fingers square with one layer of mud.

original: 復次當知欲燒食等供養者。
analyzed: 復次當知欲燒食等供養者。
translated: Next, you should know that if you wish to burn food and other offerings,

original: 面向東方心想觀佛呪燒供養。
analyzed: 面向東方心想觀佛呪燒供養。
translated: face east, visualize the Buddha in your mind, chant the mantra, and burn offerings.

original: 若求勝上事伏其怨敵脫諸難者。
analyzed: 若求勝上事伏其怨敵脫諸難者。
translated: If you seek superior matters and subdue your enemies and escape difficulties,

original: 面向東北呪燒供養若欲願求恩福而作法者。
analyzed: 面向東北呪燒供養若欲願求恩福而作法者。
translated: If one wishes to seek blessings and merit, face northeast when chanting and burning offerings.

original: 面向東南呪燒供養。🔽若為趁故而作法者。🔽呪師面向南方燒供養誦呪。🔽若求大願故而作法者。
analyzed: 面向東南呪燒供養。 若為趁故而作法者。 呪師面向南方燒供養誦呪。 若求大願故而作法者。
translated: If one wishes to chase away evil spirits, face southeast when chanting and burning offerings.🔽If one wishes to heal illnesses, face south when chanting and burning offerings.

original: 呪師面向西南呪燒供養。🔽若為愍念故而作法者。🔽呪師面向西方呪燒供養。🔽若為和於鬪諍及療病者。
analyzed: 呪師面向西南呪燒供養。 若為愍念故而作法者。 呪師面向西方呪燒供養。 若為和於鬪諍及療病者。
translated: If one wishes to fulfill great vows, face southwest when chanting and burning offerings.🔽If one wishes to have compassion, face west when chanting and burning offerings.

original: 呪師面向西北呪燒供養。🔽若為厭伏故而作法者。
analyzed: 呪師面向西北呪燒供養。 若為厭伏故而作法者。
translated: If one wishes to reconcile disputes and heal illnesses, face northwest when chanting and burning offerings.

original: 呪師面向北方呪燒供養。
analyzed: 呪師面向北方呪燒供養。
translated: If one wishes to subdue enemies, face north when chanting and burning offerings.
Next, one should know the method of offering spoons.
The handle is one cubit long and the surface is concave.

original: 如並母指節外許大當知。
analyzed: 如並母指節外許大當知。
translated: It should be as big as the joint of the thumb.
If it is for all good dharmas,

original: 用其銅匙銀匙金匙三種隨用。
analyzed: 用其銅匙銀匙金匙三種隨用。
translated: use copper, silver, or gold spoons, whichever is suitable.
If it is for all evil dharmas,
Use the miscellaneous living white hammer copper spoon.

original: 復次當知燒火善惡有其十種相。
analyzed: 復次當知燒火善惡有其十種相。
translated: Next, you should know that there are ten kinds of good and evil in burning fire.
The first characteristic is that the flame is like the first sun.
The second characteristic is that its color is glossy.
The third characteristic is like the color of crystal.
The fourth characteristic is like the color of pure ghee.
The fifth characteristic is like the color of gold.
The sixth characteristic is that the fire is smokeless.

original: 第七相者明熾掣焰若似語聲。
analyzed: 第七相者明熾掣焰若似語聲。
translated: The seventh characteristic is that the bright and blazing flame is like the sound of speech.

original: 第八相者一燒至盡無殘餘者。
analyzed: 第八相者一燒至盡無殘餘者。
translated: The eighth characteristic is that it burns to the end without any remainder.

original: 第九相者其柴多少總令恰盡。
analyzed: 第九相者其柴多少總令恰盡。
translated: The ninth characteristic is that the firewood is burned just right, no more or less.

original: 第十相者先令著火燒地使熱。
analyzed: 第十相者先令著火燒地使熱。
translated: The tenth characteristic is to first put the fire on the ground to heat it.

original: 又汝當知若應如是十種相者。
analyzed: 又汝當知若應如是十種相者。
translated: Moreover, you should know that if it is like these ten characteristics,

original: 當知所行之法皆悉成驗。
analyzed: 當知所行之法皆悉成驗。
translated: You should know that the practiced Dharma will all be accomplished.
Moreover, you should know that if the flame does not come out,

original: 或燒柴不然或但出烟如是之時不應作法。
analyzed: 或燒柴不然或但出烟如是之時不應作法。
translated: Or if the firewood does not burn or only emits smoke, at such times one should not perform the rites.
One should know that the time has come for the person to die and worry.

original: 又汝當知若火氣冷或無潤氣。
analyzed: 又汝當知若火氣冷或無潤氣。
translated: Moreover, you should know that if the fire's energy is cold or lacks moisture,

original: 或火星迸出或出烟焰相連。
analyzed: 或火星迸出或出烟焰相連。
translated: or if sparks fly out or smoke and flames connect,
or if the flames shoot into the ashes, all of these are inauspicious signs.
One should know that the rites will not produce any results.

original: 又汝當知若火中所出便穢臭氣。
analyzed: 又汝當知若火中所出便穢臭氣。
translated: Moreover, you should know that if foul-smelling vapors emerge from the fire,
or if various bad smells emerge,
or if the flames are white or lack smoke and flames,
and shoot black and slanted into the ground,

original: 如是相者當知有人作諸障難。
analyzed: 如是相者當知有人作諸障難。
translated: one should know that someone is creating obstacles.

original: 又汝當知若火先起赤焰。
analyzed: 又汝當知若火先起赤焰。
